label: AB3_hP24_178_b_ac-001
title: AuF$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
Previously (Hicks, 2019) used the data from (Asprey, 1964) to describe this structure.  We have updated this to use the more recent data from (\v{Z}emva, 1991).  This does not change the essential nature of the structure. 
 This structure can also be found in \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_hP24_179_b_ac-001}{the enantiomorphic space group $P6_{5}22$ \#179}.  That page presents the original data from (Asprey, 1964).
